_header: God Lord that sits in throne
_description: A prayer for remembrance of the Passion — six couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.First Lines:
God lord þat sittes in troneNu & euere þu here my
                    mone…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þat i mouwe comen to þi blissedþat euere
                    withouten ende sal leste
NLS18721.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 346.
